title: #167: Teacher's Pet: Analysing The Ad and Helena's Statement
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa continue their discussion and analysis of Lyn Dawson's disappearance and The Teacher's Pet. We analyse the ad placed in the Daily Telegraph on 27 March 1982 by Chris Dawson and Helena Simm's statement to the police that was written seven days after the "Antecedent Report" on 21 August 1982.


#HerNameWasLynDawson

#TheTeachersPet
